item.title: Microsoft is a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Container Management
item.description: We’re proud to announce that Microsoft has once again been recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Container Management, for the third year in a row. The post Microsoft is a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Container Management appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/microsoft-is-a-leader-in-the-2025-gartner-magic-quadrant-for-container-management/
